_description: Completed tasks log. Append-only — never delete entries.

tasks.title: Build complete static website (31 pages)
tasks.summary: Homepage, 10 comparisons, 10 categories, tools directory, about, disclosure, 2 tool reviews. Dark navy design, mobile responsive, hamburger nav.

tasks.title: Add Open Graph meta tags and fix review page navigation
tasks.summary: OG + Twitter Card tags on all 28 pages. Fixed nav on clay-review and instantly-review to match site structure.

tasks.title: Add 404 page, favicon, blog stub, JSON-LD, canonical URLs
tasks.summary: Custom 404 page, SVG favicon on all pages, blog/resources stub, JSON-LD on 15 remaining pages, canonical URLs on 4 missing pages, sitemap + redirects updated.

tasks.title: Add project brief, CLAUDE.md, and Publish Agent
tasks.summary: CLAUDE.md with project context and two-tool workflow rules. docs/project-brief.md (597 lines). scripts/publish.js — full Publish Agent with Airtable integration, HTML template generation, sitemap updates.

tasks.title: Build multi-agent orchestration system (6 agents + coordination)
tasks.summary: 6 agent definitions in .claude/agents/ (publish, site-builder, seo-auditor, content-reviewer, deployment, analytics-tracker). Coordination system with active_work, completed_work, planned_work_queue, standards, and daily_pipeline workflow.

tasks.title: Build Data Agent with freshness check script
tasks.summary: New data-agent.md: monitors Airtable data freshness, spot-checks G2/vendor sites, discovers new tools, generates freshness reports. Companion script scripts/data-check.js: connects to Airtable API, analyzes staleness (30/90 day thresholds), checks local file coverage (redirects, review pages), generates markdown reports with recommendations. Supports --json, --stale-only, --days flags.
